Kerri Marusiak

Web Developer | Dog-Lover | Woodworker

I have recently completed an intensive four month web development programme at We Got Coders, and am excited to continue my path as a web developer. Through morning lectures, afternoon pair programming, and evening self study developed a solid understanding of Ruby and developed a strong interest in database structures and Javascript, in particular React.

MDN - WebRTC: Still photo capture demo

This example demonstrates how to set up a media stream using your built-in webcam, fetch an image from that stream, and create a PNG using that image.
